mapper.sql: ID, COL_EXAM_ID, COL_ACCOUNT_ID, COL_PARER_COUNT, COL_LIMIT_COUNT, COL_IS_PASS, COL_CREATOR_ID, COL_CREATE_TIME
mapper.select: select t.COL_EXAM_ID as colExamId, t.COL_PARER_COUNT as colParerCount, t.COL_LIMIT_COUNT as colLimitCount, t.COL_IS_PASS as colIsPass, f.COL_EXAM_NAME as colExamName, f.COL_EXAM_DESC as colExamDesc, f.COL_OPEN_TIME as colOpenTime, f.COL_CLOSE_TIME as colCloseTime, f.COL_DURATION as colDuration, f.COL_TOTAL_SCORE as colTotalScore, f.COL_PASS_SCORE as colPassScore, f.COL_SUBJECT_DB_ID as colSubjectDbId from tb_exam_account t, tb_exam f where t.COL_ACCOUNT_ID = #{accountId,jdbcType=CHAR} and t.COL_PARER_COUNT = #{parerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} and t.COL_EXAM_ID = f.ID
mapper.insert: insert into tb_exam_account (ID, COL_EXAM_ID, COL_ACCOUNT_ID, COL_PARER_COUNT, COL_LIMIT_COUNT, COL_IS_PASS, COL_CREATOR_ID, COL_CREATE_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{colExamId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{colAccountId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{colParerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{colLimitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{colIsPass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{colCreatorId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{colCreateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into tb_exam_account
ID,
COL_EXAM_ID,
COL_ACCOUNT_ID,
COL_PARER_COUNT,
COL_LIMIT_COUNT,
COL_IS_PASS,
COL_CREATOR_ID,
COL_CREATE_TIME,

mapper.update:
update tb_exam_account
COL_EXAM_ID = #{colExamId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COL_ACCOUNT_ID = #{colAccountId,jdbcType=CHAR},
COL_PARER_COUNT = #{colParerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COL_LIMIT_COUNT = #{colLimitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COL_IS_PASS = #{colIsPass,jdbcType=INTEGER},
COL_CREATOR_ID = #{colCreatorId,jdbcType=CHAR},
COL_CREATE_TIME = #{colCreateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update tb_exam_account set COL_EXAM_ID = #{colExamId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COL_ACCOUNT_ID = #{colAccountId,jdbcType=CHAR}, COL_PARER_COUNT = #{colParerCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COL_LIMIT_COUNT = #{colLimitCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COL_IS_PASS = #{colIsPass,jdbcType=INTEGER}, COL_CREATOR_ID = #{colCreatorId,jdbcType=CHAR}, COL_CREATE_TIME = #{colCreateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
